adddoing.mainHeading: Your active contribution to health and education
adddoing.description: WellFit goes beyond theory: our "learning by doing" approach offers you interactive experiences that directly improve your health, fitness and skills. Whether in parks, museums, zoos or at home - with WellFit you can track your activities, receive personalized feedback and continuously learn and grow.
adddoing.vision: Our vision is to make technology, health and education accessible everywhere - no matter where you are.
adddoing.museumDescription: Experience the captivating fusion of technology, art, and history through a unique interactive journey.
adddoing.parksDescription: On every outing, you will expand your knowledge about our wonderful "Mother Nature."
adddoing.homeDescription: Use personalized applications to optimize your fitness and knowledge from the comfort of your own home.
adddoing.zoosDescription: WellFit will deepen your understanding of a wide variety of animal species.

footer.newsletterDescription: Stay informed about the upcoming phases of WellFit and the release of our whitepapers!

contribution.title: Your contribution to a better future
contribution.text1: By participating in the first phase of our pre-sale, you are laying a cornerstone for the future of WellFit â€“ and beyond. Your investment is more than just financial support: it secures the patent for our groundbreaking technology and empowers us to turn the vision of WellFit into reality.
contribution.text2: Through the acquisition of WellFit Tokens, you become part of a movement that redefines the boundaries of health, education, and technology. You help us protect innovation, enhance quality of life, and create a platform that inspires people worldwide.
contribution.text4: You wonâ€™t just witness a revolution in health and technology â€“ youâ€™ll actively shape it. Together, weâ€™re building a world where wellness and knowledge go hand in hand. Join us as WellFit moves the world forward.
contribution.text6: Your decision propels us all toward a brighter future.

roadmap.footerNote: This roadmap may change as we grow and adapt to community needs and new technologies.

items.q: What is WellFit?
items.a: WellFit is a platform that combines health, technology, and education. Users earn tokens through movement, learning, and social interaction, which can be redeemed for NFTs, virtual content, or platform features.

items.q: What makes WellFit special?
items.a: The combination of gamification, blockchain (Solana), and education makes WellFit unique. Users experience virtual avatars, interactive activities, and a reward system that motivates healthy behavior.

items.q: What technologies does WellFit use?
items.a: WellFit uses Solana blockchain, AI, AR, and gamification elements.

items.q: How can I join the WellFit community?
items.a: By registering on the platform, participating in challenges, and developing your avatar.

items.q: Why does WellFit use the Solana blockchain?
items.a: Solana offers high speed, low transaction costs, and eco-friendliness â€“ ideal for microtransactions within the WellFit system.

items.q: What are WellFit tokens and how do they work?
items.a: Tokens are earned through activities such as movement, learning, and avatar care. They can be redeemed for NFTs, digital content, and exclusive features.

items.q: What happens if I lose tokens?
items.a: Tokens are stored on the blockchain. If access is lost (e.g., wallet), there is no refund â€“ users are responsible for their security.

items.q: What features will be added in the future?
items.a: Staking, NFT marketplace, educational challenges, and full avatar customization. The roadmap outlines all phases in detail.

items.q: Is there a roadmap for new features?
items.a: Yes. The roadmap outlines milestones through the end of 2026 â€“ from pre-sale phase to full platform availability.

items.q: When will WellFit be fully available?
items.a: The platform is currently in Pre-Sale Phase 1. Initial availability is planned for late 2026.

items.q: Which milestones have already been reached?
items.a: Tokenomics defined, blockchain integrated, Pre-Sale Phase 1 started, whitepaper published.

items.q: What are NFTs in WellFit?
items.a: Unique digital collectibles that can unlock avatars, offer rewards, or provide access to exclusive content.

items.q: How do avatars work in WellFit?
items.a: Avatars are virtual companions that grow through activity, learn new skills, and can be used in quests.

items.q: How does WellFit motivate users to be active?
items.a: Through daily, weekly, and monthly challenges, a level system, token rewards, and social competitions.

items.q: What are WellFit tokens and how can I earn them?
items.a: WellFit tokens are the internal currency of the platform. You earn them by walking, completing fitness tasks, solving puzzles, or exploring locations.

items.q: How can I acquire NFTs in WellFit?
items.a: NFTs can be earned through special challenges or bought using WellFit tokens. They offer benefits such as rare avatars or access to bonus content.

items.q: Can tokens be traded?
items.a: Yes. Once the marketplace is live, users will be able to buy tokens starting at â‚¬1 each, sell, or trade them with each other.

items.q: Why should I hold WellFit tokens?
items.a: Tokens unlock access to exclusive features, NFT purchases, and premium content. Early adopters benefit from better staking bonuses and beta access.

items.q: How can I support WellFit as an influencer?
items.a: You can create content, motivate your community to join challenges, or run giveaways. You'll receive token rewards and long-term collaborations.

items.q: Are there exclusive offers or content for influencers?
items.a: Yes. Influencers get early access, OG badges, special tokens and NFTs. Content is tailored to their audience style.

items.q: Can influencers help shape development?
items.a: Absolutely. We value feedback and invite influencers to beta tests or feature discussions.

items.q: Who is WellFit suitable for?
items.a: For all age groups â€“ from children and families to seniors, schools, and companies (e.g., corporate wellness).

items.q: Can people with disabilities use WellFit?
items.a: Yes. It includes accessible functions and customizable challenges for various needs.

items.q: Is WellFit safe for children?
items.a: Yes. WellFit offers child-friendly content with voice control, reading support, and playful activities. Parents can monitor usage and content.

items.q: How does WellFit support older adults?
items.a: Seniors receive age-appropriate challenges like walking, stretching, or museum visits. Motivation comes from social groups, tokens, and virtual tours.

items.q: What happens if I donâ€™t care for my avatar?
items.a: The avatar loses energy and becomes sad. After a period of inactivity, it may be put up for adoption. Caring and being active unlocks new rewards.

items.q: Can I invite friends and play together?
items.a: Yes, you can invite friends, form groups, and participate in challenges together. There are competitions and leaderboards.

items.q: How do AR experiences work in WellFit?
items.a: Users can see and interact with avatars in parks, museums, or zoos. QR codes and GPS unlock new content.

items.q: How do you prevent addictive behavior through gamification?
items.a: There are daily limits, pause functions, and educational content. WellFit promotes mindful play over endless repetition.

items.q: How do you protect user data?
items.a: State-of-the-art encryption is used, only essential data is stored, and nothing is shared with third parties.

items.q: What happens to inactive users?
items.a: After a period of inactivity, we send reminders. Tokens and progress remain but are unusable without activity. Avatars may run away.

items.q: What devices do I need for WellFit?
items.a: A smartphone is sufficient. Fitness bands and optional wearables are recommended but not required.

items.q: When will the marketplace go live?
items.a: The digital marketplace will be released in Phase 3 â€“ expected mid-2026.

items.q: Which devices are compatible with WellFit?
items.a: WellFit works with smartphones, tablets, and many fitness trackers. Activities can also be logged manually.

items.q: How does WellFit make money?
items.a: Through token sales, NFT trading, premium subscriptions, corporate partnerships, advertising, and event gamification.

items.q: What do I gain from investing?
items.a: Early investors receive tokens at a discounted price, NFTs, staking rewards, exclusive app rights, and beta access.

items.q: When can I trade or sell tokens?
items.a: After the marketplace launch in Phase 3. Early buyers in the internal community will receive advance notifications.

items.q: How will my pre-sale investment be used?
items.a: For the development of the app and community building. Investors support the platformâ€™s foundation.
